short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draw and customize colored shapes directly on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the first version of the extension, and there are still improvements to be made. Please don't hesitate to provide your feedback here.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1iCzBcTd88GTCXIP-Aaujj2In2unQHWkHZmUq-Msi804/prefill

This Chrome extension lets you draw and customize colored shapes directly on any webpage. Whether for annotations, brainstorming, or visual highlights, users can create a variety of shapes in different colors to enhance their web experience. It's an easy-to-use tool for adding creative, visual elements to online content.

How to Use the Extension

Open the Extension to Draw a Shape
--> Before you can start drawing shapes, make sure the extension is open.

Minimize the Extension to Interact with the Page
--> If you need to interact with the webpage again, just minimize the extension.

Drawing Temporary Shapes
--> Use the left click to draw temporary shapes on the page.

Drawing Persistent Shapes
--> Use either the middle click or the right click to draw shapes that will remain on the page.

Erasing Persistent Shapes
--> To remove persistent shapes, simply use a single left click.
